title: tAyumAnavanE
sahitya:
tAyumAnavanE tandaiyum tAyumAnavanE


anupallavi

  Ayum maraigaLum mAyanoDaiyanum aDimuDi toDarvarum
 aruL uruvoDu tirishira giri tanil vaLar tirut-


caraNam    tanakkuyar voppillai enrulaguyir uNarttavO tanaiyaDaivOrkkut-tarum
 padat-taLavuNarttavOmanattir-keTTAda uyar malaittalai vITriruppa
 maNNil anraikkOr gatiyaTra kanrupparuvam uTRa panrikkuruLaikaTkum
